View Abdi's Full Profile

Summary

I'm a technology junkie and have been using computers since my early teens. I love problem solving and making a difference to the world, which is why I chose to become a software developer.

Over the years I have worked with incredibly smart and experienced individuals and this has taught me how to work collaboratively with others to produce results of the highest quality.

I have a BEng in Computer Systems from the University of Greenwich. However, I believe that education is continuous and that is why I constantly strive to keep my knowledge and skills up-to-date in the ever changing world of the 21st century that we live in.

I'm currently freelancing with Founders and Coders and if you have any interesting projects that you would like me to work on with you, then you can reach out to me through my profile.
